subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The United States will face off on Monday against Ghana, in a matchup that over the last decade has turned into an unexpected rivalry. Victory for the Americans would be a long time coming.
snippet: The United States will face off on Monday against Ghana, in a matchup that over the last decade has turned into an unexpected rivalry. Victory for the Americans would be a long time coming.
